title: Agito
content: My guess is that it's a custom logo, though the Agito website crashed my machine, and I couldn't look through the site for other examples of the face. But for a typeface with a similar flavor, try Barry Deck's [Template Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825011535/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/template-gothic/).
author: cheshiredave

comments.content: The way that the A and G are weighted 'wrong' makes me think that this is drawn by a Japanese who has good design skills, but doesn't know Roman letters that well.
